title: Riot, why are players like this allowed in ranked?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
With 6 boots the guy continued to play another 10 games and pretty much lost 9 of them. 

Just why, do we allow people like this to continue playing ranked, or even play at all? 

One of the players from his games screenshotted the image and this guy was using all the racial slang you could find. How about stop paying for some psychology intern and hire someone to review the report tickets?

Red please reply.

replies.body: dude theres like 2 games where he sells his stuff for the boots/revolvers at the last minute when hes actually lost, you do know that right? hes buying pink wards and sightstones where he needs to, so besides the racism maybe hes just bad? consider that if you havent seen him play, which you havent mentioned
Well seeing as everyone except him fed quite a bit, He must have just been joking when he bought all that stuff cause it was a lost cause. Although racism isnt on.

Yeah he's clearly just bought them just as the game ends as a joke. 4 kills and 5 assists it actually a decent contribution for a losing team. Don't worry about his racial slurs in-game, he'll get banned for them as long as people reported him. It's the only thing the automated tribunal does well.
